Name: Kneeling Statue Holding Naos of Neith
Description: The statue of this kneeling man, holding a naos in his hands, is supported by a column at the rear. Both his feet and knees are placed on a platform. The man is wearing a round wig that leaves his ears free. A hieroglyphic text covers the top and front of the naos and proclaims the name and titles of the owner. It also offers a prayer to the deity.
